verses.verse: וַיִּהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> old שָׂרָ֔ה <S%H8283><s%> And Sarah מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> [these were] the years וְשֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8141><s%> years חַיֵּ֥י <S%H2416><s%> of the life שָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H8283><s%> of Sarah

וַתָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שָׂרָ֗ה <S%H8283><s%> And Sarah בְּקִרְיַ֥ת אַרְבַּ֛ע <S%H7153><s%> in Kirjatharba הִ֥וא <S%H1931><s%> he חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> the same [is] Hebron בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> came אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> and Abraham לִסְפֹּ֥ד <S%H5594><s%> to mourn לְשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> for Sarah וְלִבְכֹּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and to weep

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> stood up אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before מֵת֑וֹ <S%H4191><s%> his dead וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the sons חֵ֖ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

גֵּר־ <S%H1616><s%> I [am] a stranger וְתוֹשָׁ֥ב <S%H8453><s%> and a sojourner אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> among תְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> with you give לִ֤י אֲחֻזַּת־ <S%H272><s%> me a possession קֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H6913><s%> of a buryingplace עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> among וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <S%H6912><s%> with you that I may bury מֵתִ֖י <S%H4191><s%> my dead מִלְּפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> out of my sight
וַיַּעֲנ֧וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children חֵ֛ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham לֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֽוֹ׃

שְׁמָעֵ֣נוּ ׀ <S%H8085><s%> Hear us אֲדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> my lord נְשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> prince אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> thou [art] a mighty אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בְּתוֹכֵ֔נוּ <S%H8432><s%> among us בְּמִבְחַ֣ר <S%H4005><s%> in the choice קְבָרֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6913><s%> of our sepulchres קְבֹ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4191><s%> thy dead אִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִבְר֛וֹ <S%H6913><s%> from thee his sepulchre לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִכְלֶ֥ה <S%H3607><s%> of us shall withhold מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> for מִקְּבֹ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> but that thou mayest bury מֵתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4191><s%> thy dead

וַיָּ֧קָם <S%H6965><s%> stood up אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed לְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> himself to the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [even] to the children חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> of Heth

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> And he communed אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> with them saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> If it be אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁכֶ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> your mind לִקְבֹּ֤ר <S%H6912><s%> that I should bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵתִי֙ <S%H4191><s%> my dead מִלְּפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> out of my sight שְׁמָע֕וּנִי <S%H8085><s%> hear וּפִגְעוּ־ <S%H6293><s%> me and intreat לִ֖י בְּעֶפְר֥וֹן <S%H6085><s%> for me to Ephron בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צֹֽחַר׃ <S%H6714><s%> of Zohar

וְיִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> That he may give לִ֗י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְעָרַ֤ת <S%H4631><s%> me the cave הַמַּכְפֵּלָה֙ <S%H4375><s%> of Machpelah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ל֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> which he hath which [is] in the end שָׂדֵ֑הוּ <S%H7704><s%> of his field בְּכֶ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money מָלֵ֜א <S%H4392><s%> as it is worth יִתְּנֶ֥נָּה <S%H5414><s%> he shall give it לִ֛י בְּתוֹכְכֶ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> amongst you לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <S%H272><s%> me for a possession קָֽבֶר׃ <S%H6913><s%> of a buryingplace

וְעֶפְר֥וֹן <S%H6085><s%> And Ephron יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children חֵ֑ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> answered עֶפְר֨וֹן <S%H6085><s%> and Ephron הַחִתִּ֤י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> Abraham בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the audience בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children חֵ֔ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth לְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all בָּאֵ֥י <S%H935><s%> [even] of all that went in שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> at the gate עִיר֖וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nay אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> my lord שְׁמָעֵ֔נִי <S%H8085><s%> hear me הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> the field נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> give I לָ֔ךְ וְהַמְּעָרָ֥ה <S%H4631><s%> thee and the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֖וֹ לְךָ֣ נְתַתִּ֑יהָ <S%H5414><s%> that [is] therein I give it לְעֵינֵ֧י <S%H5869><s%> thee in the presence בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons עַמִּ֛י <S%H5971><s%> of my people נְתַתִּ֥יהָ <S%H5414><s%> give לָּ֖ךְ קְבֹ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> I it thee bury מֵתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4191><s%> thy dead
וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> bowed down אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> And Abraham לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> himself before עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> And he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֶפְר֜וֹן <S%H6085><s%> unto Ephron בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <S%H241><s%> in the audience עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> will only אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you ל֖וּ <S%H3863><s%> But if thou [wilt give it] I pray thee שְׁמָעֵ֑נִי <S%H8085><s%> hear נָתַ֜תִּי <S%H5414><s%> me I will give כֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> thee money הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> for the field קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> take מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <S%H6912><s%> [it] of me and I will bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵתִ֖י <S%H4191><s%> my dead שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there
וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered עֶפְר֛וֹן <S%H6085><s%> And Ephron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham לֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֽוֹ׃

אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord שְׁמָעֵ֔נִי <S%H8085><s%> hearken אֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> unto me the land אַרְבַּ֨ע <S%H702><s%> [is worth] four מֵאֹ֧ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שֶֽׁקֶל־ <S%H8255><s%> shekels כֶּ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver בֵּינִ֥י <S%H996><s%> what [is] that betwixt וּבֵֽינְךָ֖ <S%H996><s%> between מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵתְךָ֖ <S%H4191><s%> therefore thy dead קְבֹֽר׃ <S%H6912><s%> me and thee? bury

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אַבְרָהָם֮ <S%H85><s%> And Abraham אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֶפְרוֹן֒ <S%H6085><s%> unto Ephron וַיִּשְׁקֹ֤ל <S%H8254><s%> weighed אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> and Abraham לְעֶפְרֹ֔ן <S%H6085><s%> to Ephron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֕סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the silver אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which he had named בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the audience בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons חֵ֑ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred שֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver עֹבֵ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> current לַסֹּחֵֽר׃ <S%H5503><s%> [money] with the merchant

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> were made sure שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> And the field עֶפְר֗וֹן <S%H6085><s%> of Ephron אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בַּמַּכְפֵּלָ֔ה <S%H4375><s%> which [was] in Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [was] before מַמְרֵ֑א <S%H4471><s%> Mamre הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> the field וְהַמְּעָרָ֣ה <S%H4631><s%> and the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בּ֔וֹ וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> which [was] therein and all the trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> that [were] in the field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבֻל֖וֹ <S%H1366><s%> that [were] in all the borders סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> Unto Abraham לְמִקְנָ֖ה <S%H4736><s%> for a possession לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the presence בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children חֵ֑ת <S%H2845><s%> of Heth בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all בָּאֵ֥י <S%H935><s%> before all that went in שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> at the gate עִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> of his city

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And after כֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> this קָבַ֨ר <S%H6912><s%> buried אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> Sarah אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מְעָרַ֞ת <S%H4631><s%> in the cave שְׂדֵ֧ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֛ה <S%H4375><s%> of Machpelah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מַמְרֵ֖א <S%H4471><s%> Mamre הִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> he חֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> the same [is] Hebron בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> that [is] therein were made sure הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <S%H7704><s%> And the field וְהַמְּעָרָ֧ה <S%H4631><s%> and the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֛וֹ לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <S%H272><s%> for a possession קָ֑בֶר <S%H6913><s%> of a buryingplace מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> by the sons חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> of Heth ס
